definition: the most highly proteinaceous vegetable known
details:
noun
- the most highly proteinaceous vegetable known
= example: the most highly proteinaceous vegetable known
= synonyms: soybean, soya, soya bean
- thin sauce made of fermented soy beans
= synonyms: soy sauce
- erect bushy hairy annual herb having trifoliate leaves and purple to pink flowers

- a source of oil
= synonyms: soybean, soya bean
